Texas Pregnancy Care Network   
12885 Research Boulevard   
Suite 207   
Austin, TX 78750 
TPCN 1-1 Project Work Plan 
# 
SP Services to Clients September 1, 2007 August 31, 2008 
Statewide Media Advertising September 1, 2007 August 31, 2008 
The RAPID marketing system will advertise the RAPID 1-888-LIFE-AID toll-free patch system.   
Depending on the market, advertising may includle television or radio. 
Community Awareness Conference Attendance October 1, 2008 August 31, 2009 
TPCN will staff a Community Awareness Booth at human services professional conferences. This will increase awareness of the Texas Altermatives to Abortion Services Program and assist in recruiting other agencies to make client referrals to the Program. 
# 
November 1, 2007   
May 1, 2008 
Written materials provided to Service Providers for use in their client service activities will have been pre-screened by TPCN and approved by Health and Human Services Commission. 
SP Ongoing Site Monitoring September 1, 2007 August 31, 2008 
Jervice Provider (SP) Recruitment September 1, 2007 August 31, 2007 
Service Provider recruitment will be ongoing throughout Fiscal Year 2007-08. Evaluation Checklists will be sent and Q&A Sessions will be hosted when requested by organizations meeting minimum Program requirements. A targeted mail campaign to potential Service Providers (social service agencies, pregnancy centers, maternity homes and adoption agencies) will occur in October. Responders will receive Evaluation Checklists and attend Q&A session before submitting applications and receiving training. 
Letters to candidate Service Providers October 1, 2007 October 31, 2007   
Evaluation checklist to responders October 15, 2007 August 31, 2008   
Q & A Session for potential SP's November 2007 August 31, 2008   
SP Review and Approval November 2007 August 31, 2008   
SP Ongoing Approval November 2007 August 31, 2008

Service Provider Annual Program Re-Training August 1, 2008 August 31, 2008 
CPA Audit of TPCN FY 07-08 Activitics 
November 1, 2008 November 14, 2008
